description: Lists all AWS accounts assigned to the user. These AWS accounts are assigned by the administrator of the account. For more information, see Assign User Access in the IAM Identity Center User Guide. This operation returns a paginated response.

parameters.name: accessToken
parameters.description: The token issued by the CreateToken API call. For more information, see CreateToken in the IAM Identity Center OIDC API Reference Guide.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The page token client that is used to retrieve the list of accounts.

nested_items.name: accountList
nested_items.description: A paginated response with the list of account information and the next token if more results are available.

nested_items.name: accountId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the AWS account that is assigned to the user.

nested_items.name: accountName
nested_items.description: The display name of the AWS account that is assigned to the user.

nested_items.name: emailAddress
nested_items.description: The email address of the AWS account that is assigned to the user.
